description:
Lift the Fig Leaf and check those figs.

An estimated 6.75 million men globally have the chromosomal abnormality detailed in this app.

Download this application to check out the common symptoms with quick call and email buttons to a UK charity.

You don't have to have all symptoms at the moment to have the condition.
versionNote: The calendar function allows you to add a reminder on your phone to see your doctor. The reminder includes details of the test required to make a formal diagnosis.
